Kingdom Hearts.Name: Protect Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Protera Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Protega Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Significantly raises (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Fire Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 20% and slightly raises (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Fira Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 20% and raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Firaga Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 20% and significantly increases (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Firagun Band
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 20%, and raises (+2) Strength and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Blizzard Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces ice damage by 20% and slightly raises (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Blizzara Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces ice damage by 20% and raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Blizzaga Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces ice damage by 20% and significantly increases (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Blizzagun Band
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces ice damage by 20%, and raises (+2) Strength and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Thunder Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces lightning damage by 20% and slightly raises (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Thundara Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces lightning damage by 20% and raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Thundaga Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces lightning damage by 20% and significantly increases (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Thundagun Band
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces lightning damage by 20%, and raises (+2) Strength and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Element Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire, ice, and lightning damage by 20% and raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Three Stars
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire, ice, and lightning damage by 20% and significantly raises (+4) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Obsidian Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces dark damage by 20%, and slightly raises (+1) Strength.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Chaos Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces dark damage by 20% and slightly raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Dark Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces dark damage by 20% and slightly raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ability Stud
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+2) max AP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Guard Earring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+3) max AP and (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Master Earring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+4) max AP and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Power Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+1) Strength.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Golem Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+3) Strength and (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Titan Chain
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Significantly raises (+4) Strength and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Energy Bangle
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+3) max HP and (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Angel Bangle
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+6) max HP and (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Gaia Bangle
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Significantly raises (+9) max HP and (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Magic Armlet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+1) max MP. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Rune Armlet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+1) max MP and (+2) Defense. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Atlas Armlet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+2) max MP and (+2) Defense. Also significantly enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Brave Warrior
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+3) max HP and (+1) Strength.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ifrit's Horn
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 20% and raises (+1) max AP and (+1) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Inferno Band
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire and dark damage by 20%. Also raises (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: White Fang
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+1) Strength, (+1) Defense, and (+1) max AP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ray of Light
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Slightly raises (+3) max HP and (+1) MP. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Holy Circlet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire, ice, and lightning damage by 20%. Also raises (+3) max AP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Raven’s Claw
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces dark damage by 20%. Also raises (+2) Strength and (+2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Omega Arts
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+3) max HP, (+3) Strength, and (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Moogle Badge
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+6) max HP, (+1) max MP, and (+1) max AP. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Cosmic Arts
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Greatly raises (+9) max HP, (+2) max MP, and (+2) max AP. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Heartguard
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+3) max HP and (+4) Defense, and reduces dark damage by 20%.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Crystal Crown
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises (+6) max HP, (+1) max MP, (+3) max AP, (+2) Strength, and (+2) Defense. Also enhances Magic and Summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ribbon
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces all elemental damage by 20% and raises (+3) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Royal Crown
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire, ice, and lightning damage by 20%. Raises (+2) max MP, but reduces (-3) Strength.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Prime Cap
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Greatly reduces (-5) Strength, but greatly increases (+5) Defense.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: If hit over 100 times.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Shiva Belt
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces ice damage by 40%, and raises (+2) max MP. Also enhances magic and summon power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ramuh Belt
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces lightning damage by 40%, and raises (+2) max AP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ifrit Belt
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Reduces fire damage by 40%, and raises (+3) Strength.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: EXP Earring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Increases experience obtained by 20%.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: EXP Ring
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Increases experience obtained by 20% and slightly raises (+1) max MP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: EXP Bracelet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Increases experience obtained by 30%, but reduces (-2) Strength and (-2) Defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: EXP Necklace
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Increases experience obtained by 30%, and slightly raises (+2) max AP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Potion
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores 30 HP of one character.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Hi-Potion
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores 60 HP of one character.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mega-Potion
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores 30 HP of each party member.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ether
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores 3 MP of one character.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mega-Ether
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores 3 MP of each party member.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Elixir
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Fully restores a character’s HP and MP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Megalixir
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Fully restores the party’s HP and MP.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: If hit over 100 times.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Tent
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Fully restores the party’s HP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Camping Set
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Restores all HP and 3 MP of each party member.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Cottage
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Fully restores the party’s HP and MP.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Power Up
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises Strength by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Defense Up
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises Defense by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: AP Up
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max AP by 1.

If summoned in Traverse Town and after the second/third time gauge is filled.

Kingdom Hearts.Description: Crystalized essence of vitality.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Dazzling Stone
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mysterious stone filled with light.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Shiny Crystal
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A crystal bursting with the essence of three elements.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mythril Shard
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mineral shard containing rare metal.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: After breaking all 11 pots
If summoned in End of the World and after the second/third time gauge is filled.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mythril
Kingdom Hearts.Description: An extremely rare metal ore.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: If summoned in End of the World and after the third time gauge is filled.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mythril Stone
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mysterious stone born from a rare ore.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: After eleventh pot destroyed
If less than 11 pots are broken

Kingdom Hearts.Description: Droplet of a crystalized, mysterious substance.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: If juggled 10 times.
If juggled 50 times.
If juggled 100 times.
If any spell is cast three times.
If defeated with a combo finisher.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Serenity Power
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mysterious crystal filled with feelings of gratification.

EnemyDrops.AdditionalInformation: If hit 40 times.
If hit 70 times.
If hit 100 times.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Gale
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A howling gale frozen in crystal form.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Stormy Stone
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mysterious stone filled with wind.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Orichalcum
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A rare and most valuable ore.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Dark Matter
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A rare ore found once in a blue moon.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Wooden Sword
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A toy sword made of wood.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Default weapon on Destiny Islands, also temporarily granted by Riku at Hollow Bastion.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Kingdom Key
Kingdom Hearts.Description: The keychain attached draws out the Keyblade's true form and power.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Speak to Riku while the Heartless are attacking Destiny Islands.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Jungle King
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Has a long reach, but seldom deals critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Lock the Keyhole in Deep Jungle.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Three Wishes
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A powerful weapon that is difficult to deflect.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Wishing Star
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Has a short reach, but always finishes up a combo attack with a powerful critical blow.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Spellbinder
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 2, and significantly enhances magic and summon power.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Speak to Merlin after acquiring all seven first-level magic spells.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Crabclaw
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 1, and enhances magic and summon power. Also deals good physical damage.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Pumpkinhead
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Has a long reach and the ability to deal a string of critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Lock the Keyhole in Halloween Town.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Fairy Harp
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 1, and enhances magic and summon power. Sometimes deals powerful critical blows.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Metal Chocobo
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Possesses incredible power and reach, but reduces max MP by 1. Rarely deals critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Defeat Cloud in the Hercules Cup.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Olympia
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A powerful weapon that is difficult to deflect. Capable of inflicting mighty critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Chest in the Coliseum's lobby after completing the Phil, Pegasus, and Hercules Cups.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Lady Luck
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 2, and significantly enhances magic and summon power. Also inflicts good physical damage.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: White Trinity mark in the Wonderland's Lotus Forest.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Oblivion
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Possesses colossal power, but reduces max MP by 1.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Chest in Hollow Bastion's Grand Hall.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Divine Rose
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A powerful weapon that is difficult to deflect. Capable of dealing a string of critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: After sealing Hollow Bastion's Keyhole, talk to Belle in the library.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Oathkeeper
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 1, and enhances magic and summon power. Capable of dealing a string of critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Talk to Kairi in Traverse Town's secret waterway after rescuing her.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Lionheart
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Raises max MP by 1, and enhances magic and summon power. Also deals great physical damage.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Defeat Leon and Cloud in the Hades Cup.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Diamond Dust
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Greatly enhances magic and summon power. Raises max MP by 3.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: One-Winged Angel
Kingdom Hearts.Description: Has little power, but sometimes deals extremely powerful critical blows. Reduces max MP by 2.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Ultima Weapon
Kingdom Hearts.Description: The ultimate Keyblade. Raises max MP by 2, and possesses maximum power and attributes.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mage's Staff
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff that heightens magic power.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Morning Star
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff that heightens magic power. Can also be used for physical attacks.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Warhammer
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A hammer made for combat. Reduces max MP by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Shooting Star
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff that heightens magic power. Also fairly good for physical attacks.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Magus Staff
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mystical staff brimming with power. Raises max MP by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Silver Mallet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A powerful hammer made for combat. Reduces max MP by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Wisdom Staff
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mystical staff brimming with power. Raises max MP by 1. Also fairly good for physical attacks.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Grand Mallet
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A tremendously powerful hammer made for combat. Reduces max MP by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Wizard's Relic
Kingdom Hearts.Description: An enormously powerful staff sometimes left behind by Wizards. Raises max MP by 2.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Lord Fortune
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff strong in both physical and magical power. Raises max MP by 1.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Speak with the Fairy Godmother after obtaining all Summons.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Violetta
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A rod that sometimes inflicts massive damage. Reduces max MP by 1.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: White Trinity mark at the Coliseum gates.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Dream Rod
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A mysterious rod holding unknown power. Raises max MP by 2.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Speak to Merlin after acquiring all seven third-level magic spells.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Save the Queen
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff of immense magical and physical power. Raises max MP by 2.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Meteor Strike
Kingdom Hearts.Description: The most powerful staff. Sometimes deals critical blows.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Chest at the End of the World's giant crevasse.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Fantasista
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A staff that focuses solely on magic. Raises max MP by 3.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Knight’s Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A standard-issue knight's shield.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Smasher
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield made for attack rather than defense. Small and easy to handle.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Stout Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A large shield better suited for defense than offense. Effective against various forms of attack.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mythril Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield that strikes a fine balance between attack and defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Gigas Fist
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A small, powerful shield made for attack rather than defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Golem Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A large shield best suited for defense. Also an effective assault weapon.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Onyx Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A well-balanced and effective shield for both attack and defense.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Adamant Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A large shield best suited for defense. Effective against various attacks, and also a powerful assault weapon.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Dream Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield to protect loved ones. Raises max MP by 2.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Speak to Merlin after acquiring all seven spell arts from the White Mushrooms.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Herc's Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield with enormous power sealed within. Made for attacking.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Defender
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A rugged shield sometimes left behind by Defenders. Raises max MP by 1.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Genji Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield of surpassing offensive and defensive strength.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Defeat Yuffie in the Hades Cup.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Save the King
Kingdom Hearts.Description: The most powerful shield. Raises max MP by 2.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Complete the Hades Cup’s time trial.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Mighty Shield
Kingdom Hearts.Description: The most powerful shield. Small, but effective.
Kingdom Hearts.AdditionalInformation: Chest at the End of the World's world terminus.

Kingdom Hearts.Name: Seven Elements
Kingdom Hearts.Description: A shield that focuses solely on magic. Raises max MP by 3.
